name: A Baby to Toddler Farm Animals and Motors Music Game
name_original: A Baby to Toddler Farm Animals and Motors Music Game
description:
Babies to toddlers will love these animals and Motors!
Touch the adorable animals and motors and listen to them.
For older toddlers there is a find the Animal or Motor Game.
Find the Cow, Horse or Plane and Car.

Your baby or toddler will learn about farm animals and their sounds: horse, cow, sheep, rooster, Pig, duck, dog or cat!
As well as motors: Fire engine, airplane, police, car, motorcycle, helicopter, ambulance or Bus

Simplicity is the key to a successful app for babies to toddlers.

When first played, your toddlers and babies may not be able to correctly touch the animal with thier little hand.

Play this game with your baby continuously for a few hours or days, and you will be surprised at the mobile development of your baby's hands.

This App game must be played in the presence of a parent or legal guardian, and it is encouraged for you to guide your baby through the game for a few days at first.

When to play:

When your baby is hungry or will not stop crying, playing this game can hold your baby's attention. The various sounds, animated animals can stimulate your baby's curiosity.

This game is exceptionally handy for mothers and fathers who spend time with their babies but cannot figure out how to spend that time usefully.

Caution
Playing the application too much amount of time or leaving the children alone with the iPhone or iPad is discouraged.
